oxycodone

NAME : Oxycodone CHEMICAL NAME : (5a)-4,5-Epoxy-14-hydroxy-3-methoxy-17-methylmorphinan-6-one (hydrochloride) CHEMICAL FORMULA C 18 H 21 NO 4 MOLECULAR WEIGHT 351.82 (HCl) MELTING POINT 218-220 (long rods from alc.) SOLUBILITY HCl soluble in water (1 g / 6-7 ml water), slightly soluble in alcohol.
